{"blocks":[{"key":"2vq2n","text":"Additional components:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"265sq","text":"H2O","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61bdf","text":"m2p plate with cultures","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qsf5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"768fr","text":"Centrifuge options:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31iuq","text":"Avanti-15R-centrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b1p5","text":"Allegra-25R","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anjr5","text":"Eppendorf 5810R","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k3jl","text":"(any swinging-bucket centrifuge capable of spinning a 96-deepwell plate)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3magk","text":"NOT the Eppendorf 5430","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2h00","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"h74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5k4np","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e5l0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2l6eo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi1iu","text":"We will use two Biomek methods for this assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"174ec","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91kmj","text":"The first method will prepare:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6akmg","text":"a Tecan plate for OD600 measurements, with 10x dilution of the samples  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s1e2","text":"two 96-deepwell plates as an intermediate step for preparing a Tecan plate for OD340 measurements - one with 1 mL of samples (supernatant plate) and the other with 1 mL of water for balance in the centrifuge ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"772nn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12naf","text":"The second method will prepare:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3jsl","text":"a Tecan plate for OD340 measurements (aliquoting cell supernatants from the 96-deepwell plate)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2vkeo","text":"If you wish to set up a method in advance of a run, you may access the Biomek remotely. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"28aqf","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":9,"offset":35}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"32sd6","text":"Follow the instruction provided in this file.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7ehri","text":"Request a password for a Windows Active Directory (AD) account from Arthur Panganiban (ahpanganiban@lbl.gov)","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":12,"offset":31,"style":"bold"}],"key":"159te","text":"Find your Biomek, use password Robotp@ss978","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"49A486D917E211ECBDAA0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oYmrMbwePS0Xq-9nNzL4mjqcnJ5k8mVoYnNieopn07g/edit"},"mutability":"","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7i4cb","text":"The first method takes around   before the pause and   after the pause","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bfikq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gv77","text":"When the method pauses, remove the two 96-deepwell plates and continue the Biomek run","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fej3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2D4F71C0180F11EC9F20E7A4B34BC3D2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2B471A2317E511ECBDAA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7dtbm","text":"Centrifuge run:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4ftg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h7gi","text":"Place the two 96-deepwell plates sealed in the centrifuge and spin at max speed for   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3B10CC5917E511ECBDAA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vfqg","text":"Carefully remove the supernatant plate from the centrifuge, remove the seal and place it back in the Biomek ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lan3","text":"Start the second Biomek method to prepare a Tecan plate for OD340 measurements (takes around   )","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6a3fe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"DE5AF8D0181011EC9F20E7A4B34BC3D2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
